meanings.definition: The part of a garment that is turned back on the chest and lapel.
meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed a flower on his lapels.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted her lapels before entering the room.
meanings.sent3: The lapels on his jacket seemed to have a mind of their own, flipping up unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was like perfectly pressed lapels, always sharp and noticeable.
meanings.sent5: The lapels of his coat were like welcoming arms, inviting you in for warmth.

meanings.definition: A flap of cloth on a garment.
meanings.sent1: The lapels of the coat added a touch of elegance to his outfit.
meanings.sent2: She sewed a button onto the lapels of her shirt.
meanings.sent3: The lapels on the dress fluttered in the breeze like tiny wings.
meanings.sent4: His coat's lapels were like little flags waving in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The lapels of her blouse were soft to the touch, like petals of a flower.
